data.text: @jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric It’s just funny that the source/ website is titled Crooked. It’s just funny. Just putting it out there
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric This has been one of my favorite episodes. You guys are so thoughtful, as unbiased as possible, and my faves.
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric I appreciate you guys bringing Erin in for this one. A good, thoughtful choice.
@jonfavs @crookedmedia @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric The watch/blade factory ad made my day 🙂

@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric Listening to yesterday's ep. Awesome! And after the hearings, i needed the laugh of sharpened razor blade watches.  And how can we get in @morninggloria 's group text?

@jonfavs @crookedmedia @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric The MVMT ad where @jonlovett mixed up the stories for watches and razors is the first time I’ve laughed in a week, so thanks for leaving it in, guys
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric A great pod guys very smitten with @morninggloria and @katiecouric I wanted more time with each of them :)

@jonfavs @crookedmedia @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric You sowed the wind for decades to come. I fear that the whole country will reap the whirlwind. & The consequences will extend long past my nomination. Two quotes from Kavanaugh's opening statement that will surely drive his decisions and need for retribution from the bench.
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric One of the things that has given me the most comfort today was @morninggloria saying how this is the origin story for women who will rise up
@jonfavs @crookedmedia @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric @jonlovett mixing up the ads was great! They all merge into one for me as well because they never update their copy.
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric I heard it this morn & loved hearing @morninggloria ‘s perspective! It made me want to start listening to Hysteria
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric @morninggloria Needs to be a permanent host on @PodSaveAmerica
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric We need @morninggloria on the Pod every Thursday!
@jonfavs @PodSaveAmerica @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric ‘Their aunt Lydia’ seriously best line on today’s pod.

@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric You should have a lady with you on every Thursday pod as a regular contributor. You must include our voices on your flagship pod. We love you but...honestly...with love.. make it happen.

@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric The face you make if you are a privileged while male Ivy League alumnus being questioned by an uppity woman in a hearing that threatens your god given right and destiny to a lifetime appointment to the highest court in the land! https://t.co/C2HRYj5d8J
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric Can @morninggloria be a permanent Thursday co-host?
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric Can't wait to listen. Been keeping up with you and your crew's tweets all day.
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric Me too!
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric She was not believable
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric @jonfavs been waiting for you all day : ).
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric #iamdrford
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric https://t.co/Bq5gg318dE
@jonfavs @morninggloria @danpfeiffer @katiecouric Listening right now!
